cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP control port to an out-of-range value 99999 will cause F1-C interface binding failures and prevent F1AP message exchange with the DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an unknown value 'debugg' will cause the logging system to fail and potentially crash the DU process during startup.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌級別設定為未知值 'debugg' 會導致日誌系統失敗，並可能在啟動期間崩潰 DU 程序。
